age.description: By default, no minimum age is selected.
age.title: Minimum age

by.description: Only one sort criterion can be selected at a time.
by.hint: The up arrow indicates ascending order (smallest to largest, oldest to newest, A to Z). The down arrow indicates descending order (largest to smallest, newest to oldest, Z to A).
by.title: Sort by

duration.description: By default, no duration is selected.
duration.hint: The 'max' mode selects items with the chosen duration or less. The 'min' mode selects items with the chosen duration or more.
duration.title: Duration

filter.type: Would you like to search among movies or series?

genre.description: By default, no content genre is selected.
genre.title: Content genre

mark.description: By default, no minimum rating is selected.
mark.title: Minimum rating

monetization.description: By default, all availability types are selected.
monetization.title: Availability type

multiSelect.loading: Start typing to search for items...
multiSelect.selected: No items selected | {count} item selected | {count} items selected

votes.description: By default, no number of votes is selected.
votes.hint: The 'max' mode selects items with the chosen number of votes or fewer. The 'min' mode selects items with the chosen number of votes or more.
votes.title: Number of votes
